channel.title: Changing Things Up - LP [The Remixes]
channel.description:
Hey everyone,
If you remember a couple of weeks ago, I hosted a remixing contest for my LP, “New Beginnings”. Now I am hosting a second remixing contest, but with the tracks from the “Changing Things Up” LP.
**PRIZES** All participants will be included in the “Changing Things Up - The Remixes” EP / LP that will be released on Soundcloud, Spotify, Apple Music, Google Play Music and Youtube. (If you only want to be in the Soundcloud EP / LP, let me know when you submit your remix).
Top 3 will be prioritised in the EP / LP track order and the rest of the LP will be in chronological order (when you submit your remix).
**RULES** 1. The remixes needs to last more than 2 minutes in order for it to be valid. (I will accept tracks which are 5 seconds less than the minimum requirement, if necessary).
2. You are allowed to remix more than one track, but you can only submit one track which you think is the best out of all the tracks.
3. You need to post this track on SoundCloud in order for it to be valid.
4. You are allowed to use your own cover art, when you post your remix.
5. *(Does not apply to Soundcloud only participants)* Send a private message to me with the project link or the WAV file of your remixes.
**JUDGES** @GreyOldTwit [Main Judge] @Mr_Mooo [Co-Judge] @The_Osprey [Co-Judge]
***NOTE:*** Judges are allowed to participate, but their votes will not be bias (I’ll make sure of that).
**LP LINK** [Changing Things Up - LP (SoundCloud)](https://soundcloud.com/greyoldtwit/sets/changing-things-up-lp)
[Changing Things Up - LP (Spotify)](https://open.spotify.com/album/6skkrBpufd1XPzYTMWwllg?si=1sEZpFp6RDqOjTBx0MNbHw)
**PROJECT LINKS** - [Changing Things Up](https://app.auxy.co/projects/WfplJ8LnWRm5mmN_9Tbrcg==)
- [I’m Living Lifeless](https://app.auxy.co/projects/SJ8AFzlHIdDb-GfvdEpKAA==) (credit to @Mr_Mooo)
- [Among Friends](https://app.auxy.co/projects/9X9Gywk5OrNe40xlgHmpiA==)
- [Fly!](https://app.auxy.co/projects/etnGVewF5ARwuiXtI93lQA==) (with @The_Osprey)
- [Good Old Times](https://app.auxy.co/projects/Bf5LNQvd1CdIX6HZFqVsHQ==) (credit to @tictacto)
- [Torn Between Universes](https://app.auxy.co/projects/gNeNumWkdU6cTOXYhRYK4A==)
- [Endless](https://app.auxy.co/projects/Y9URD8bfqUj-nsDCd3JyDg==) (with @Mr_Mooo)
- [Who We Are (VIP)](https://app.auxy.co/projects/9JW4UCgA2_ifvj-QkaV0VQ==)
**DEADLINE** [date=2019-06-18 time=19:00:00 timezone="Australia/Adelaide"] → [date=2019-07-18 timezone="Australia/Adelaide"] (Australian Central Timezone)
**FINAL MESSAGE** Good luck to everyone and have fun. Also try not to forget about it like last time :rofl:. ~ GreyOldTwit

item.title: Changing Things Up - LP [The Remixes]
item.dc:creator: GR3Y
item.description:
Hey everyone,

If you remember a couple of weeks ago, I hosted a remixing contest for my LP, “New Beginnings”. Now I am hosting a second remixing contest, but with the tracks from the “Changing Things Up” LP.

PRIZES
All participants will be included in the “Changing Things Up - The Remixes” EP / LP that will be released on Soundcloud, Spotify, Apple Music, Google Play Music and Youtube. (If you only want to be in the Soundcloud EP / LP, let me know when you submit your remix).

Top 3 will be prioritised in the EP / LP track order and the rest of the LP will be in chronological order (when you submit your remix).

RULES

  1. The remixes needs to last more than 2 minutes in order for it to be valid. (I will accept tracks which are 5 seconds less than the minimum requirement, if necessary).

  2. You are allowed to remix more than one track, but you can only submit one track which you think is the best out of all the tracks.

  3. You need to post this track on SoundCloud in order for it to be valid.

  4. You are allowed to use your own cover art, when you post your remix.

  5. (Does not apply to Soundcloud only participants) Send a private message to me with the project link or the WAV file of your remixes.

JUDGES
@GreyOldTwit [Main Judge]
@Mr_Mooo [Co-Judge]
@The_Osprey [Co-Judge]

NOTE: Judges are allowed to participate, but their votes will not be bias (I’ll make sure of that).

LP LINK
Changing Things Up - LP (SoundCloud)

Changing Things Up - LP (Spotify)

PROJECT LINKS

  • Changing Things Up

  • I’m Living Lifeless (credit to @Mr_Mooo)

  • Among Friends

2019-06-18T09:30:00Z UTC → 2019-07-17T14:30:00Z UTC (Australian Central Timezone)

FINAL MESSAGE
Good luck to everyone and have fun. Also try not to forget about it like last time . ~ GreyOldTwit
